text.0: we choose agni the messenger the herald master of all wealth.
text.1: well skilled in this our sacrifice.
text.2: with callings ever they invoke agni agni lord of the house.
text.4: bring the gods hither agni born for him who strews the sacred grass.
text.5: thou art our herald meet for praise.
text.6: wake up the willing gods since thou agni performest embassage.
text.7: sit on the sacred grass with gods.
text.8: o agni radiant one to whom the holy oil is poured burn up.
text.10: by agni agni is inflamed lord of the house wise young who bears.
text.11: the gift the ladle is his mouth.
text.12: praise agni in the sacrifice the sage whose ways are ever true.
text.13: the god who driveth grief away.
text.14: god agni be his strong defence who lord of sacrificial gifts.
text.16: whoso with sacred gift would fain call agni to the feast of gods.
text.18: such agni purifier bright bring hither to our sacrifice.
text.19: to our oblation bring the gods.
text.20: so lauded by our newest song of praise bring opulence to us.
text.21: and food with heroes for our sons.
text.22: o agni by effulgent flame by all invokings of the gods.
text.23: show pleasure in this laud of ours.
